title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil water, add spaghetti, and cook for 10-15 minutes.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: Chicken, onion, garlic, tomato sauce, and spices.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and add garlic, onion, and chicken. Cook for 10-15 minutes. Add tomato sauce and cook for another 5-10 minutes.

title: Vegetarian Burrito Bowl
summary: A hearty and healthy bowl filled with rice, beans, vegetables, and avocado.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and add rice, beans, and vegetables. Cook for 10-15 minutes. Add avocado and cook for another 5-10 minutes.

title: Classic Beef Lasagna
summary: Layers of pasta, ground beef, tomato sauce, and cheese, baked to perfection.
ingredients: Pasta, ground beef, tomato sauce, and cheese.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Add ground beef and tomato sauce. Cook for 15-20 minutes. Add cheese and bake for another 5-10 minutes.
